title: Bug 13189: Refactoring - Deleting Fields - Context menu overridden by message dialog
description: 20020409I on LinuxMotif and w2k:1. Setup JUnit2.
OB: When performing refactoring by deleting fields in TestCase.java and right-clicking on 'fName' in the outliner, the context menu is overridden by a message dialog.
EB: After enabling the option 'Code GeneratorRemove prefix from field names,' the context menu for deleting fields in TestCase.java should not be overridden by a message dialog.
SR: Ensure that the context menu for deleting fields remains functional and is not overridden by message dialogs when the option 'Code GeneratorRemove prefix from field names' is enabled.
